page.title: 15LIFE STYLES
page.content: LIFE STYLES. There is no entertainment in the area. People are satisfied to lead a comparitively quiet life,visiting and entertaining their friends in their own homes.Most of the homes are well equipped with modern home entertainments(television,video recorders,music centres,computers). Most popular styles in fashion are the tweed skirt or suit and woollen look, or casual clothes such as jeans and tee shirts,jogging suits and leisure wear.For work or business most men wear a suit with shirt and tie,and women wear skirt and blouse or neat dress or suit.People tend not to be followers of fashion,especially in their every-day apparel. The two Hotels in the area provide excellent facilities for eating-out, with good lunch or dinner menus.
